Determination.name: Determination
Determination.blurb: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
Determination.description: Innate: Xin Zhao gains a Determination I and Determination II stack for every  Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-hit, up to a maximum of two.
Determination.description2: At two Determination I stacks, Xin Zhao's next  Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-hit consumes the stacks to  heal him for  10 − 78 (based on level) (+ 10% AD) (+ 40% AP) health.
Determination.description3: At two Determination II stacks, Xin Zhao's next  Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-attack consumes the stacks to deal 15 / 25 / 35 / 45% (based on level) AD  bonus physical damage.
Determination.notes:
* The Determination II stacks are not visible on the champion's buff bar in-game.
 Hitting one or more enemies with  Wind Becomes Lightning applies one stack per strike. The bonus damage applies to all enemies of one strike, but the healing only once.
 If  Guinsoo's Rageblade would trigger when the Determination II stacks are at maximum, the bonus stack will instead overstack, and be consumed on the next Determination II usage.

Three Talon Strike.name: Three Talon Strike
Three Talon Strike.blurb: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
Three Talon Strike.description: Active: For the next 5 seconds, Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks each deal bonus physical damage and reduce his other ability  cooldowns by 1 second each.
Three Talon Strike.leveling:
Bonus Physical Damage:
20 / 28 / 36 / 44 / 52 (+ 40% bonus AD)
Total Bonus Damage:
60 / 84 / 108 / 132 / 156 (+ 120% bonus AD)
Three Talon Strike.description2: Talon Strike is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
Three Talon Strike.description3: The third basic attack  knocks up the target for 0.75 seconds.
Three Talon Strike.description4: Three Talon Strike resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer.
Three Talon Strike.notes:
* Three Talon Strike has no cast time and does not interrupt Xin Zhao's previous orders.
 Three Talon Strike's cooldown will begin only after the duration ends or the third enhanced attack is consumed.
  Spell shield will block only one empowered attack as well as the knockup.
 The enhanced attacks present input buffering during their wind-up animation (they cannot be canceled and Xin Zhao cannot be issued any commands until after it ends).
 Three Talon Strike are on-attack and do not interact with  Guinsoo's Rageblade.

Wind Becomes Lightning.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
Wind Becomes Lightning.blurb: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.
Wind Becomes Lightning.description: Active: Xin Zhao performs two strikes over 0.5 / 0.4 (based on bonus attack speed) seconds.
Wind Becomes Lightning.leveling:
Slash Damage:
30 / 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 (+ 30% AD)
Slash Minion-Damage:
15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 (+ 15% AD)
Wind Becomes Lightning.description2: The first deals physical damage to all enemies in an arc, and the second deals physical damage in a line,  slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1.5 seconds.
Wind Becomes Lightning.description3: Both strikes deal 50% reduced damage against minions, benefit from 33.3% of Xin Zhao's  life steal and the duration of his other abilities is paused during the effect.
Wind Becomes Lightning.notes: *  Spell shield will block only a single instance of damage - either the thrust or the slash.

Audacious Charge.name: Audacious Charge
Audacious Charge.blurb: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
Audacious Charge.description: Active: Xin Zhao  dashes to the target enemy, dealing  magic damage to all nearby units and  slowing them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
Audacious Charge.description2: Xin Zhao then gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

Crescent Guard.name: Crescent Guard
Crescent Guard.blurb: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
Crescent Guard.description: Passive - Challenge: The last enemy champion targeted by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or  Audacious Charge is  Challenged for 3 seconds.
Crescent Guard.description2: Active - Awareness: After 0.35 seconds, Xin Zhao sweeps around him, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, capped at 600 (+ 100% bonus AD) against monsters, while also  knocking back all non- Challenged enemies hit.
Crescent Guard.leveling2:
Physical Damage:
75 / 125 / 175 / 225 / 275 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 15% of target's current health)
Crescent Guard.description3: For the next 3 seconds, Xin Zhao is  invulnerable against enemy champions more than 450-units away from him. His basic attacks and other spell casts extend the duration by 0.3 seconds.
Crescent Guard.notes:
*Pets, clones, traps, bombs, DoTs, and delayed-damage skills will not damage Xin Zhao if the enemy champion source is outside the circle when the damage applies.
Enemy minions, towers, and jungle monsters will damage Xin Zhao even when they are outside   Crescent Guard's range.
 Crescent Guard does not negate crowd control effects, it only negates the damage portion.
